item.title: ExtraCurriculars Coding Experience
item.description: Wells Fargo Task 1 tags: Data Modeling, Entity Relationship Diagramming, System Design Develop a data model for a new investment management system The system will help manage multiple financial advisorsâ€™ clients. Financial advisors must be able to create, update, and remove clients. Each financial advisor can have numerous clients. Financial advisors will be using the system during standard business hours from 9 to 5 on weekdays. Each client will have a portfolio.
